name: example-gtk4
description: It takes the hassle away from building Gtk4 application in Python So you can create a cool application, without all the boilerplate code

scripts.build:types: ts-for-gir generate gtk4 Gtk-4.0 Polkit-1.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build:app && npm run start:gjs
